data.actual_result: The button is greyed out and unclickable, until you type something in the textbox of "other"
data.expected_result: You can click "next", as you filled in a game you create content for
data.short_description: Can't click on next on partnership application when leaving Game Titles "Other" option empty
data.steps_to_repro: - go to the partner application page - fill in your info until you should name the game title you create content for - select a game and the option "other" but leave the option blank - click next, then unclick the "other" option you clicked - try to click "next" again - observe
